content: 14st r18 4sc increase 6sc increase 2sc 16st r19 5sc increase 7sc increase 2sc 18st <tail> read first chain 11 working back down starting at 2nd chain from hook increase 2sc skip next chain slip_stitch 2sc increase 2sc join with slip_stitch to next stitch r20 6sc <tail> 12sc 18st + tail *make sure the tail is in centre of the back adjust as needed r21-23 18sc 18st 3rounds r24 12sc 3dccl in next 2 st toes 2sc 2 3dccl 18st stuff body and legs r25 in blo 9dec around 9st r26 4dec to close 5st fasten_off leaving a longish tail looshkin will look like et now to define legs stitch from front to back between the feet to about 2 row below the tail ears make 2 r1 4sc in a ring 4st r2 increase single_crochet x2 6st r3 increase 2sc x2 8st r4 8sc 8st r5 increase 3 single_crochet x2 10st r6 10sc to finish lightly stuff and flatten stitch the ears onto the head using images as a guide using black yarn stitch a nose in the middle and 2 eyes using pictures or looshkin as a guide i made the eyes about 3 rounds long with 2 black stitches the nose was 2 stitches wide and about 4 black stitches your looshkin should look something like this ☺ hope you enjoyed making it
